title: From traditional to innovative integrated aquaculture solutions  A success story from Chilimbene

tasks.task: Establish integrated aquaculture and agriculture projects in Mozambique
subtasks: Design and implement fish farming systems
Train women and youth in aquaculture and agricultural practices
Integrate livestock production (e.g., chickens, rabbits) into the system
Teach good agricultural practices, seed selection, fertilization, and irrigation techniques
Enhance market access and marketing skills for farm products
Promote nutritional awareness and balanced diets

tasks.task: Strengthen food security and resilience in Mozambique
subtasks: Rehabilitate agricultural food systems damaged by cyclones and other disasters
Address the decline in fisheries and resulting food shortages
Provide capacity building for local farmers and communities
Develop sustainable farming techniques that address climate change challenges

tasks.task: Support the empowerment of women and youth in Mozambique
subtasks: Engage women and youth in agricultural and aquaculture training programs
Create job opportunities for women and young people in integrated farming systems
Foster leadership and business skills among local participants
Encourage entrepreneurship in sustainable agriculture and aquaculture
